newsitem.title: JAPAN: Shiseido to have new president.
newsitem.headline: Shiseido to have new president.

text.p: Shiseido Co Ltd said on Thursday vice president Akira Genma would become president after June this year to revamp the company's management.
Current president Yoshiharu Fukuhara will become chairman, the cosmetics maker said in a statement.
The planned personnel change needs to be approved at the company's annual shareholders' meeting and a board meeting to be held in late June, the company said.
Fukuhara has been Shiseido's president since July 1987. The company has been smoothly implementing a new medium-term management plan covering five years from April 1996, it added.
